article_title: With seventh Final Four on tap, Omaha ref John Higgins shares his favorite memories
article_text:
Previous Next With seventh Final Four on tap, Omaha ref John Higgins shares favorite memories Official John Higgins watches as Texas A&M coach Mark Turgeon, right, points during the second half of an NCAA college basketball game against Kansas at the 2010 Big 12 tournament.

Posted: Saturday, April 2, 2016 9:00 am

Posted in Blogs, Sport on Saturday, April 2, 2016 9:00 am. | Tags: John Higgins, Roger, Four, Final, Omaha, Officiate, Game

og.description: Omaha official John Higgins — who's been tabbed to officiate his seventh Final Four this weekend — has probably refereed more basketball games than you've watched in your lifetime. They likely tend to blur together.
og.title: With seventh Final Four on tap, Omaha ref John Higgins shares his favorite memories
